TopicTitle: Start mission timer on launch pad without launching?

Articles.Content:
Been messing around with movable launch pads, and is stuck at this hurdle:

How do I start a mission on LP, drive my rig down of the pad, say to the far side of the VAB, without mission timer resetting when I actually launch?

I've tried fitting a single launch stability enhancer, but in vain..

The purpose of it all, of course, is to do a challenge about moving a vertical launcher on wheels a certain distance, and only then launch to achieve orbit/escape in shortest possible time. Or something along those lines. The fun being getting safely down the ramp with a high centre of mass
Have a probe that you can launch from ontop of the rocket with seperatons and a parachute? It should not stop counting when it lands back on kerbin me thinks.
Would copying the vehicle to the SPH and launch from there work? The mission timer starts as soon as you have control of the craft if you launch that way.
Both useful answers, but neither really fits my idea for a challenge mission. Hmm, I will have to shelve the idea. Thanks!
